We are also a host site for the Dominion Energy EnergyShare program offering utility assistance for those in need. The program and funds are provided by Dominion Energy.   We are a healthy pantry offering fresh produce every day.     We have our paperwork offered in English and Spanish, and have our onsite announcement board in English, Spanish, Pashto, and Dari. We offer Halal food as well.     We host Health & Wellness Day 2x monthly offering free wellness checks, hearing & vision tests and nutrition education.   ", "notes": "We offer opportunities for volunteers groups or individuals daily. We also offer volunteer opportunities for court ordered hours.
